title: Projectile motion - expression for final speed

content.question: A ball is launched vertically down with initial speed <math alttext="v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> from the edge of a table of height <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>h</mi></math>. The ball reaches the ground a time <math alttext="t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> after it is launched. Which of the following is a correct expression for the instantaneous speed of the ball immediately before it reaches the ground?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction h, over t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>h</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="v sub 1, plus g times t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="v sub 1, plus g times t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
